name: Preschool
description: For children aged 3 to 5 years. This Mandarin Bilingual program provides children with the opportunity to learn Mandarin in an immersive, activity-based environment facilitated by our experienced bilingual teachers. No prior knowledge of Chinese language is required from either the child or the family.

howToGetIt: For admissions information visit their website. There you can take virtual tour and [register to take an in person tour] (https://www.thegrowingtreeschool.com/cont.phpinquire) and make the follow up appointments to continue the admissions process.
cost: This is a fee based service.
